instructions.step1: Blend ingredients and let sit in fridge for at least 20 minutes
instructions.step2: Heat crepe or medium non-stick skillet on medium
instructions.step3: Melt a small amount of butter in pan for each crepe
instructions.step4: Pour batter in pan to desired size
instructions.step5: Cook until edges are golden and crepe is easily flipped
instructions.step6: Flip and cook half the time on second side
instructions.step7: Serve rolled with lignonberries, jam, sugar and lemon juice, or your favorite inside

instructions.step1: Wash and cut carrots into 1 cm slices, add oil and carrots to wok, cover and heat to 325-350 degrees
instructions.step2: Cook for 15-20 minutes covered until carrots begin to soften, add shallot, ginger and garlic
instructions.step3: When carrots are at desired softness, add teriyaki sauce, stir to coat thoroughly and remove from heat

instructions.step1: Heat non-stick pan or grill to 325-350 degrees
instructions.step2: Rub seasoning into one side of fillet, cook seasoning side down until half done (~6-8 minutes)
instructions.step3: Flip and finishing cooking until salmon flakes, do not overcook as it will continue cooking after removing from grill

instructions.step1: Wash, then dice potatoes, removing any bruised or bad sections
instructions.step2: Heat oil in non stick pan to around 325-350 degrees, add potatoes and cover
instructions.step3: Turn a few times until all sides are browned and potatoes are almost cooked, remove cover
instructions.step4: Add seasoning to taste, turn to coat, cook for a few minutes, add bread crumbs, turn to coat and remove from heat

item4.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1" balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 20-25 minutes
instructions.step3: Meanwhile in medium bowl mix glaze ingredients, add cooked meatballs and toss until coated
instructions.step4: Garnish with chopped chives or green ends of onions

item5.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Peel shrimp under running water, set aside
instructions.step2: Heat olive oil in wok, add shallot and ginger sautee for a minute or two
instructions.step3: Add chili's, sesame oil and shrimp, cook for 5 minutes covered, stirring several times to coat shrimp
instructions.step4: Remove from heat, add cilantro, mix and serve over noodles with lime wedge

item1.ingredient: orange bell pepper, julienned or diced

item5.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Combine orange sauce ingredientes in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Prepare veggies and place into wok
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and pre-heat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

item1.ingredient: green bell pepper, julienned or diced

item2.ingredient: red bell pepper, julienned or diced

instructions.step1: Combine sauce ingredientes in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Prepare veggies and place into wok
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and pre-heat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, and baking powder in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a seperate bowl beat egg, then add oil and buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, adding additional buttermilk to proper consistancy. Do not overmix. Let rest 10-30 minutes
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick skillet at 325-350 degrees

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, baking powder and soda in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a seperate bowl beat egg, then mix in oil, add buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, adding milk to desired consistancy. Do not overmix. Let rest 10-30 minutes

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, baking powder and spice in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a seperate bowl beat egg, then mix in oil and pumpkin, add buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, adding milk to desired consistancy. Do not overmix. Let rest 10-30 minutes

instructions.step2: Mix dry ingredients, cut butter in with pastry knife, add apricots and pecans
instructions.step3: Whisk eggs and buttermilk, add to dry ingredients and mix just until sticky
instructions.step4: Turn out dough onto lightly floured surface and knead lightly
instructions.step5: Pat dough into 9‚Äù circle on pan lightly sprayed with cooking oil
instructions.step6: Cut into 12 wedges, cutting not quite all the way
instructions.step7: Sprinkle with granular sugar and cinnamon
instructions.step9: Cut with spatula and place individual scones on cooling rack
